segments.text: I would like to speak to you , if you don ’ t mind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What would you like to speak to me about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to talk to you about this year ’ s election .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am a volunteer for this year ’ s campaign .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s wonderful . I am impressed at someone so young taking a stand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know history is about to be made , and I would like to be a part of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Go to your polling place early on Election Day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will . Good luck with your volunteering .
segments.speaker: S2
